title: BRIEF-Econocom group to acquire Altasys company
text:
BRIEF-Econocom group to acquire Altasys company Sept 22 
Sept 22 Econocom Group SA : 
* Says to have finalized agreements for 90 pct of Altasys Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
